name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Fresh salad with grilled chicken breast, spinach, cherry tomatoes, and avocado
modification_note: Can be made without chicken for vegetarian option

description.en: Fresh salad with grilled chicken breast, spinach, cherry tomatoes, and avocado
description.fi: Tuore salaatti grillatulla kananrinnalla, pinaatilla, kirsikkatomaateilla ja avokadolla
description.sv: Färsk sallad med grillad kycklingbröst, spenat, körsbärstomater och avokado

modification_note.en: Can be made without chicken for vegetarian option
modification_note.sv: Kan göras utan kyckling för vegetariskt alternativ

name: Salmon Quinoa Bowl
description: Baked salmon with quinoa, vegetables, and herbs
modification_note: Salmon can be substituted with chicken

description.en: Baked salmon with quinoa, vegetables, and herbs
description.fi: Uunissa paistettu lohi kvinoan, vihannesten ja yrttien kanssa
description.sv: Bakad lax med quinoa, grönsaker och örter

modification_note.en: Salmon can be substituted with chicken
